mapper.insert:
select MYCAREER_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_mycareer (MYCAREER_SEQ, CAREER_TYPE, PRE_COMNAME, PRE_STDT, PRE_ENDT, RETIRE_DESC, MANAGE_DESC, REF_RESUMESEQ) values (#{mycareerSeq}, #{careerType}, #{preComname} , #{preStdt}, #{preEndt} , #{retireDesc}, #{manageDesc}, #{refResumeseq})
